column4: don't know anything about quotas but check that the partition is mounted with the quotas turned on
Sounds great.  Any quick tip on how to do that?  LOL  Not trying to skip a google search but it's late and I've pressed the "search" button way too many times tonight...  lol
run "mount" in a terminal it will show mount options
Pretty much just echos my fstab info: /dev/mapper/linhost01-root on / type xfs (rw,grpquota,usrquota)
